class.name: VisualShaderNodeVectorDerivativeFunc
class.brief_description: Calculates a vector derivative within the visual shader graph.
class.description: This node is only available in [code]Fragment[/code] and [code]Light[/code] visual shaders.

members.member: A derivative type. See [enum Function] for options.

constants.constant: Sum of absolute derivative in [code]x[/code] and [code]y[/code].
